channel.title: Direct link cache problem...need help ASAP
channel.description:
I'm having some issues direct linking my cache.zip file, It gives me an error everytime I recompile and rejar it on the client.. If anyone knows how to direct link and give me a few tips (hence this is my first time doing this) Id really appreciate it.. I can skype if needed to. I appreciate it guys..
Ps: If there is a free host that direct links like Dropbox id really appreciate that info to.

item.title: Direct link cache problem...need help ASAP
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

it’s attempting to download an archive from the insidia domain. if that is not your link, change the URL calls. if that is your link, make sure the archive is correctly named and in the right path.
